text: Yet there is a current and much discussed debate about conflicting philosophical interpretations of FEP, for example, representational versus non-representational.

text: The next part, we deploy the FEP instrumentally to distinguish four main notions of representation, which focus on organizational, structural, content-related, and functional aspects respectively.
